scripts.build: yarn workspace @minodisk/medic build && yarn workspace @minodisk/medkit build && yarn workspace @minodisk/medmd build
scripts.test: yarn workspace @minodisk/medic test && yarn workspace @minodisk/medkit test && yarn workspace @minodisk/medmd test
scripts.publish: yarn workspace @minodisk/medic publish && yarn workspace @minodisk/medkit publish && yarn workspace @minodisk/medmd publish
